blog.intro: Here are some random thoughts about front-end development. I know it ain't much, but it's honest.
blog.commentsAndSupport: If you have a comment, please tag me on Twitter, I'm happy to chat! If you liked this content, maybe consider getting a shirt design of mine. Thanks a ton!

homescreenTitle.visualDescription: Chris Kirk-Nielsen: creative developer, in a heavily eighties-inspired graphical style with neon colours, a perspective grid, and a large stylised sun in the background

rss.description: Blog of a front-end developer who likes to tinker
